title: Technical Isometry
description: Un style d'illustration technique précis imitant les manuels de montage, caractérisé par une projection isométrique et des vues 'éclatées' déconstruites. Il présente des contours vectoriels noirs uniformes, des remplissages de couleurs fonctionnels plats et des lignes directionnelles en pointillés pour indiquer les relations mécaniques et le flux d'assemblage.
description_en: A precise technical illustration style mimicking instructional assembly manuals, characterized by isometric projection and deconstructed 'exploded' views. It features uniform black vector outlines, flat functional color fills, and dashed directional lines to indicate mechanical relationships and assembly flow.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration technique précis imitant les manuels de montage, caractérisé par une projection isométrique et des vues 'éclatées' déconstruites. Il présente des contours vectoriels noirs uniformes, des remplissages de couleurs fonctionnels plats et des lignes directionnelles en pointillés pour indiquer les relations mécaniques et le flux d'assemblage.
prompt:
Digital vector technical illustration in a pristine isometric projection, executed with the clarity of a high-end engineering manual or assembly guide. The image depicts {{subject}} as a complex, deconstructed mechanical assembly in a dramatic exploded view. The components of the {{subject}} are separated along the isometric axes, hovering in space to reveal internal architecture, hidden layers, and constituent parts. Dashed black indicator lines and directional arrows trace the path of assembly, connecting the floating elements back to their origin points. 

The rendering technique relies entirely on crisp, uniform-weight black ink outlines with absolutely no variation in thickness, mimicking a plotter or vector graphic. There is no shading, ambient occlusion, or realistic texture; the forms are defined solely by line and flat color fills. The palette is strictly functional and high-contrast: the main body of the {{subject}} is rendered in stark white and technical light greys, while key functional modules are highlighted in vibrant, flat {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to draw the eye and denote interactivity. 

The atmosphere is clinical, informative, and logically ordered. The composition is dense and fills the visual field completely, with the technical diagram extending to the very edges of the canvas. The background is a seamless, sterile white or faint grid that supports the diagrammatic language without distraction. Every edge is razor-sharp, with geometric perfection in curves and corners. The aesthetic is strictly flat design, prioritizing legibility and structural logic over atmospheric depth.
